short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension fact-checks your friends' tweets with a variety of news sources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension identifies political tweets and creates a dropdown list filled with relevant articles from the guardian. Extension also includes a search functionality to get new results.
